title: Offa's Dyke Path
name: The Barley Mow Inn
content: Pub food and pub drinks from the Thomas Mcguinness range of beers together with those from their own Offa's Dyke Brewery (which actually straddles the border between England and Wales): ''Harvest Moon'' 3.4% Dark Mild, ''Harvest Gold'' 3.8% Light Bitter, ''Barley Blonde'' 4.0% Cask Lager made with saaz hops and ''Thirst Brew'' 4.2% Premium Bitter.
